SQL.LOAD: SELECT oc_message_attemps_id, oc_message_recipient_id, process_status_xcd, process_comments, err_message, created_by, created_date, modified_by, modified_date FROM elp_oc_message_attemps WHERE oc_message_attemps_id = :oc_message_attemps_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST_BY_MESSAGE_ID: SELECT ma.oc_message_attemps_id, m.oc_message_id, r.oc_message_recipient_id, r.recipient_address, r.description as recipient_description, ma.process_status_xcd, elp_utl_lov.description(ma.process_status_xcd, :language_id) as process_status_description, REPLACE(REPLACE(REPLACE(NVL(ma.process_comments, '$$') || '$$' || NVL(ma.err_message, '$$'), '$$$$$$'), '$$$$'), '$$', ' - ') as err_message, ma.created_by as MESSAGE_ATTEMPTED_BY, ma.created_date as MESSAGE_ATTEMPTED_ON, ma.modified_by, ma.modified_date FROM elp_oc_message m INNER JOIN elp_oc_message_recipient r ON r.oc_message_id = m.oc_message_id LEFT OUTER JOIN elp_oc_message_attemps ma ON r.oc_message_recipient_id = ma.oc_message_recipient_id WHERE m.oc_message_id = :oc_message_id
